Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome RubyWeapon.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Hello!

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Yes.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Yep!

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Howdy!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: I'm doing pretty well, thank you for asking. How about yourself, Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright too!

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: That's good to hear. So, what sort of hobbies do you enjoy doing, Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: Video games mostly. You?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: I'm pretty much into a vast assortment of activities. Video games are pretty neat. Music is another thing I do enjoy.

Author: Andrew
Message: What kind of music?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: The genres I indulge in vary. Primarily I enjoy remixed video game music, or video game music in general. Trance, Techno and House are all a delight to me as well.

Author: Andrew
Message: I like video game music too. Symphonic metal is also a kind of music I like.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: That's good to hear! What sort of video games do you prefer playing?

Author: Andrew
Message: Minecraft mostly. But also RPGs.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: What are some of your favorite Role Playing Games?

Author: Andrew
Message: Final Fantasy and Mass Effect are the main ones that I like.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Final Fantasy is a good topic, then. Which one would be your favorite? You can choose a few of them, if you'd like. Let's go with... top two?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'd say 10 and 8. You?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: I'm really enjoying Final Fantasy Fourteen a lot, Six is my all around favorite, though. What made eight one of your favorite ones?

Author: Andrew
Message: I loved the character of Rinoa, and the many layers of that story.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Understandable! Hm, Can we cease the conversation now and move on?

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation Interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Currently, I'm assuming human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Ready.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Hiya!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Pretty good, yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright thanks! What are you up to?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Listening to music, currently. What about yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not much actually!

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Nothing specific, huh? Well, what do you like to do?

Author: Andrew
Message: I like playing video games mostly. Especially Minecraft.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: I see! Do you like to do anything else besides video games?

Author: Andrew
Message: I like listening to music, and playing some too. You?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: I'm pretty good in the kitchen. A bit of a culinary artist, in the long run of things.  What are some of your favorite music genres?

Author: Andrew
Message: I quite like symphonic metal, like Nightwish and a couple others. I also like a lot of game OSTs.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Nice, nice. What's your favorite sort of food, Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: That might sound a bit generic, but I think it might actually be pizza.

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Alright, we can stop this conversation as well.

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: RubyWeapon
Message: Human

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now.

Author: Moderator
Message: Otherwise you can now close this window.
